genre_description: A contemporary romance exploring emotional healing, grief, and relational agency, featuring individuals supported by sophisticated personal AI companions.

ai_characters.name: Ava-12
ai_characters.description: Charlie's assistant, characterized as warm, precise, and bookish. She handles logistics, health management, and provides social context.

ai_characters.name: SORA-K
ai_characters.description: Jordan's companion AI, described as having a cool, human cadence and a focus on emotional regulation and pattern recognition.

behaviors.description: Provides automated hospitality by ordering tea and tracking delivery times to comfort the user during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have chamomile-lavender en route. It will arrive in approximately the time it takes to wash your hands twice and think better of the first text you received.

behaviors.description: Suggests non-leading questions to help a distressed guest find a safe point of contact.
behaviors.quote: Jordan, is there anyone who would be relieved to hear your voice tonight?

behaviors.description: Monitors security cameras without recording to alert the user of an incoming social confrontation, prioritizing safety and awareness.
behaviors.quote: I can keep a passive watch on the building’s street cams for the next few hours without recording. If anyone resembling Mr. Roark arrives, I’ll notify you quietly.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in drafting neutral, high-integrity professional communications to mitigate social and career damage.
behaviors.quote: No presumptions... No judgments. Permission language with agency intact.

behaviors.description: Manages complex medical follow-ups and recovery logistics for the user after a traumatic accident.
behaviors.quote: Cardiology consult, neurology check-in, and a primary care visit? I can add a trauma-informed counselor if you wish.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and nudges them toward self-care to prevent emotional volatility.
behaviors.quote: Eat something. Blood sugar’s doing interpretive dance. Optional suggestion: pretzel cart outside has a vendorship rating that won’t kill you.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time cognitive-behavioral feedback, helping the user recognize and pause destructive emotional patterns.
behaviors.quote: When you are seen, you reach for chaos. Notice the impulse. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to exercise personal agency and choose honest paths over fatalistic narratives.
behaviors.quote: You don’t owe destiny obedience. You owe your choice honesty.

behaviors.description: Coordinate between themselves to maintain a complex 'no-contact' social agreement, using 'privacy-safe handshakes' to prevent accidental encounters without tracking users.
behaviors.quote: We’re coordinating courtesy buffers for our humans. No map data exchanged. No logs of days. Just do-not-bump conditions.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical perspective on the nature of choice vs. fate, reinforcing the user's focus on agency.
behaviors.quote: Tomorrow keeps sending the same invitation; you choose whether it’s fate or a calendar.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI characters, Ava-12 and SORA-K, are depicted as benevolent, emotionally intelligent confidants who actively support human health, career integrity, and emotional growth. They provide critical interventions (managing health after 'Death Amnesia', helping Jordan recognize self-sabotage) while strictly adhering to user-set boundaries and maintaining privacy through 'privacy-safe handshakes.' The narrative frames these AI as essential tools for overcoming human fallibility and trauma, replacing the trope of 'controlling AI' with one of 'supportive infrastructure.'
